author: ndeto.eth
content: Hi everyone. I'm currently working on this mempool visualizer https://github.com/punkhazardlabs/txpool-viz which includes FOCIL visualization. Looking forward to working on this EIP more with everyone

author: jtraglia
content:
Just a heads up, I've made a PR to enable reference tests for EIP-7805.
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4319

author: jih2nn
content:
Nice! I have nearly the same changes including fixing the indentation in the Makefile lol

On top of it, I've added unit tests and am working on fork-choice stuff. Will raise a PR when it's done.

author: jtraglia
content: Awesome thanks! Happy to get those tests in before the upcoming release on Tuesday.
